sections.MISSION: Comanche Troop, 1ST SQDN conducts a M240 qualification at Range 114 on 14JAN25 IOT offer War Eagles the opportunity to qualify on their assigned weapons systems.
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to qualify soldiers on the M240 machine gun IOT build confidence and lethality.
sections.KEY TASKS: – Qualify gun teams on TBLs I-III IAW TC 3-22.240.
sections.EXECUTION:
All range participants will attend a safety brief by OIC and RSO prior to Range Hot. Gunners and Assistant Gunners will use the principles of direct fire control IAW TC 3-22.240 IOT conduct TBLs I-III. OIC/NCOIC and Safeties will ensure all equipment and soldiers are accounted for upon completion of each iteration.
Gunners will receive 93 rounds for TBL I, 182 rounds for TBL II, and 203 rounds for TBL III. If gunners fail TBL II, they will receive remedial training. Retrain NCOIC will re-certify firers for a second and third attempt at qualifying. Only gunners who qualify TBL II will shoot TBL III.
CL I- M-M-A
CL III- N/A
CL IV- 10X Packs IR Chem lights
CL V – A131 DODIC: 7,280 rds 7.62 caliber CL VIII – Individual IFAKs and CLS for medic
Task to Subordinate Units
1 PLT- Range OIC, RSO, tower grader, ammo detail NCO
2 PLT– Provide 1x lane safety, 2x PAX ammo detail
3 PLT– 2x PAX gate guard requirement, 1x lane safety
HQ – MEV with medic
4.
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
The Uniform for this event will be OCPs with boots, gloves, eye pro, ACH, ear pro, NVGs, IOTV with plates, knee pads, and hydration source, BINOS
Each PLT will ensure all Soldiers are in Dragoon Standard and have received M240 PMI and familiarization.
5.
